text: hugak watina..ee wagema eewa thula sagawunu kathawan ragath me post tika harima ageyi.

“nagenahiruwarunge aashcharya” themawa kota gath 7 wani dayata kirula jathika maha pradarshanaye nila lanchanaya ampare di elidakwini.dayata kirula pradarshana kamitu sabhapathi saha widuli sandesha ha thorathuru thakshana amathi ranjith siyambaalapitiya, jyeshta amathi pi.dayarathna, sabaragamuwa palath sabha manthri udayakantha gunathilaka yana mahathwaru pradhana rajaye niladharihu kihipadenaku me elidakwime awasthawata ekwa sitiyaha.ampara,madakalapuwa, thrikunamalaya ha polonnaruwa disthrik 4 padakakota mewara dayata kirula maha pradarshanaya pawathwe.me yatathe mulu nagenahira palathema wishala sanwardhanayak sidu we.

oben ekathukaragath thorathuru oba apage web adawiyata piwisena awasthawedi ho apage nishpadana ho sewawan bhawitha karana awasthawakadi; obage nama, widyuth lipinaya, padinchi lipinaya, durakathana ankaya, kredit kadpath ankaya, bilpath lipinaya, bhugoliya pihitima, antharjala protokol lipinaya, oba pilibanda thorathuru, wiwaha yojana pilibanda thorathuru, obe chayarupa, oba pilibanda samikshana prathichara, sahayaka thorathuru, oba pilibanda anyayan wisin karana lada adahas saha samaja madhya hasirawima (pudgalika daththa samaga) apa wisin ek ras karaganu labe.

idam oppu dasa lakshayak dimata wada samahara madhyayanta depaththa kapena katha watinawa | dinamina niwasa idam oppu dasa lakshayak dimata wada samahara madhyayanta depaththa kapena katha watinawa idam oppu dasa lakshayak dimata wada samahara madhyayanta depaththa kapena katha watinawa idam amathyanshayen kopamana sewayak sidu kalath ee sewaya madhya osse janathawa atharata noyana bawa idam ha parlimenthu prathisanskarana amathi gayantha karunathilaka mahatha prakasha kaleya.
sab dana anek sahodarayinta dan penawa athi me borukara thakkadinge thathwaya.

sar api meke prathamika anshaya ayin karala meka dwithiyika pasalak (prathamika anshaya nathi) karamu dayi asala siti bandula gunawardhana amathiwaraya itha unanduwen asiya.ee kathawen janadhipathithumata sihin sinahawak pahala wiya.dengu mardanaya sandaha wana janadhipathi karya sadhaka balakaya pasugiya sanduda araliya gaha mandiraye di raswuwe janadhipathiwarayage pradhanathwayenya.
“bimathin bhanda prawahanaya karana trak rathayak padawu riyadurek tha runa kanthawak ha kuda gahanu daruwek gaman karamin thibu motar rathayak sun bun godak bawata path kara thibini.
hingaya hatadahayi, athirikthaya hathalis dahayi.

janathawa wenuwen nagi siti, janatha wimukthi peramuna ee wana wita parlimenthu niyojanayak nothibuna da ejapayata tharjanayak wemin thibina. 1982 nila wipakshaye siti parlimenthu manthriwaru ata denagen dedenakuth shrilanipaye hitapu nayakayan wishala pirisakuth 1982 janamatha wicharanaye di aanduwata pakshapathiwa lampuwa jayagrahanaya karawa aanduwe chanda kaldamime wuwamanawa wenuwen peni sitina ladi.

shri lankawata fomiyula wargikaranaye tharaga ratawak hadunwadime gaurawaya sahithawa adhiwegi bottu tharagawaliyak labana wasare bolgoda wawa aashrithawa pawathwimata shri lanka pawarbot sangamaya katayuthu sanwidhanaya karamin siti.wasara 2013di ratawal 25ka mul pele tharagakaruwan siyayakata adhika pirisak ekwana meya “neshan kap” adhiwegi bottu tharagawaliya lesin handunwayi.lowa pura athishaya janapriya adhiwegi bottu tharaga shri lanka prekshakayanta nawum athdakimak wanu athayi shri lanka pawarbot sangamaye madhya adhyaksha chandrashan perera mahatha dinaminata pawasiyapawarbot sangamaye mawu sangamaya lesa salakena yu.ayi.em hi shri lankawa 54wani samajika rata bawata pathwa siti.

ehi aya piya rayina shashikira yana charithaya nirupanaya kala ya. 2013 warshaye uyiyala jampala chith rapataye uma dewi charithaya nirupanaya thulin aya thelingu sinamawata piwisiya ya. 2014 di aya lakshmi rawe ma inthiki namathi thelingu chith rapatayeth, 2015 di sinema chupistha mawa nam thelingu chith rapatayeth ranganayehi yeduna ya. 2015 dima aya thanu nenu namathi thelingu chith rapataye kirthi namathi charithaya nirupanaya kala ya.
